data.text:
Urban winery

Located in the historical heart of Romania, within the Alba Carolina Fortress, UNIO Vini is a sanctuary for wine enthusiasts and connoisseurs of exceptional gastronomic experiences. We are the place where young wines from all the wine regions of our country find refinement and elevation.

At UNIO Vini, we are dedicated to the meticulous aging and elevation process of wines. This undergoes a fascinating transformation: young wines are guided to mature in the finest oak barrels and micro-porous ceramic amphorae. Here, they find their voice, texture, and balance under the careful care of the winemaker Eugen Odainii. After this period of evolution, these wines are meticulously blended and bottled, ready to be tasted and appreciated.

Alongside the carefully crafted wines in our urban winery, we invite you to explore a vast world of aromas and oenological delights. At UNIO Vini, you will find an impressive selection of several hundred labels of wines and other wine-based alcoholic beverages, from various regions of Romania and around the world. Additionally, we take pride in presenting a collection of “iconic” wines, praised by wine critics with top scores or gold medals, available for serving by the glass.

At UNIO Vini, the experience doesn’t stop at tasting remarkable wines. We invite you to venture and visit our barrel room, accompanied by the winemaker of the cellar. Here, you will delve into the secrets of wine aging and the art of blending. You will discover the intricate processes that transform young wine into a mature and sophisticated product, and you will learn from an expert about this ancient art.

Restaurant

Alongside our wine selection, UNIO Vini invites you to indulge in an exceptional culinary experience at our restaurant. Our menu is an exploration of local and international ingredients, crafted with passion and attention to detail by Chef Rolland Szegedi. Here, you will discover remarkable culinary creations designed to perfectly complement our wines and provide you with an authentic gastronomic experience.

UNIO Vini is much more than a winery and a restaurant; it is a place where young wines are transformed into true works of art. We welcome you with open arms to enjoy our wines and discover the joy of an extraordinary gastronomic experience.
